actors.name: United States of America
actors.description: Global superpower with dominant military, economic, technological, and cultural influence. Leader in innovation, finance, and international diplomacy.

actors.name: People's Republic of China
actors.description: Rising superpower with world's largest population, second-largest economy, growing military capabilities, and extensive global infrastructure initiatives.

actors.name: European Union
actors.description: Powerful economic and political union of 27 states, representing significant trade bloc and regulatory influence.

actors.name: Meta Platforms
actors.description: Controls dominant social media platforms affecting global communication, information flow, and public discourse for billions.

actors.name: United Nations
actors.description: Primary international organization for global governance, peace-keeping, and humanitarian coordination.

actors.name: NATO
actors.description: Powerful military alliance ensuring collective defense and security cooperation among 31 North American and European nations.

actors.name: Apple Inc.
actors.description: Tech giant with massive market influence, setting global standards in technology, consumer behavior, and digital ecosystems.

actors.name: Russian Federation
actors.description: Major military power with significant energy resources, nuclear capabilities, and geopolitical influence.

actors.name: International Monetary Fund
actors.description: Key institution in global financial system, influencing international monetary policies and economic stability.

actors.name: Alphabet Inc.
actors.description: Parent company of Google, controlling crucial digital infrastructure, information access, and technological innovation.
